docs.snippet: A Miami Republican congresswoman is defending a well-known Florida school shooting survivor from another lawmaker who attacked her for wearing a Cuban flag patch as she advocated for gun control in Washington.

headline.print_headline: Republican Lawmaker Defends Parkland Student's Cuban Flag
headline.main: Republican Lawmaker Defends Parkland Student's Cuban Flag

docs.snippet: A South Carolina school board member who is accused of posting offensive comments on social media about black people has resigned.

headline.print_headline: School Official Accused of Offensive Remarks on Black People
headline.main: School Official Accused of Offensive Remarks on Black People

docs.snippet: The California-based Shed restaurant offers up meaty slices of mushrooms that go nicely on an antipasto platter, sandwiches or seared fish.

headline.print_headline: To Nibble: Slices of Shiitake With a Salty Tang
headline.main: Pickled Shiitake Mushrooms With a Salty Tang

docs.snippet: British police removed cordons around the London headquarters of Cambridge Analytica on Thursday after they deemed a suspicious package which sparked a security alert to be safe.

headline.print_headline: Security Alert Over at Cambridge Analytica's London HQ
headline.main: Security Alert Over at Cambridge Analytica's London HQ

docs.snippet: A severely burned teenager has died more than a year after a New York car crash.

headline.main: Severely Burned New York Teen Dies Over a Year After Crash

docs.snippet: Police in Louisiana say a stranger with a machete tried to snatch two children from their mothers inside a Walmart.

headline.print_headline: Machete-Wielding Man Tried to Kidnap Children at Walmart
headline.main: Machete-Wielding Man Tried to Kidnap Children at Walmart

docs.snippet: The European Commission proposed rules on Wednesday to make digital companies pay more tax, with U.S. tech giants such as Google, Facebook and Amazon set to foot a large chunk of any bill.

headline.print_headline: EU Proposes Online Turnover Tax for Big Tech Firms
headline.main: EU Proposes Online Turnover Tax for Big Tech Firms

docs.snippet: Fund managers have begun to ditch so-called FANG stocks that powered the U.S. stock market to record highs in January and are slowly rotating into commodity-related shares and other value stocks which typically outperform in late-cycle recoveries....

headline.print_headline: FANG Stocks' Bite Has U.S. Fund Managers Looking for Alternatives
headline.main: FANG Stocks' Bite Has U.S. Fund Managers Looking for Alternatives
